definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
in broad daylight/in the middle of the day/KMT emblem, a white sun on a blue background
to daydream/to indulge in wishful thinking

sentences.english: A Romanticist reading comic books under the tree, loves to be in a daydreaming.
sentences.chinese: 阿浪漫主义读漫画书的树，喜欢在一个白日梦。

sentences.english: The young man was much given to daydreaming.
sentences.chinese: 这个年轻人老爱做白日梦。

sentences.english: When I was young I always daydreamed.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候经常做白日梦。

sentences.english: Sir , please don’t indulge yourself with idle daydreams. Take your time.
sentences.chinese: 先生，请您不要做白日梦，抓紧时间吧。

sentences.english: The day not empty, the youth will never come again.
sentences.chinese: 白日莫空过，青春不再来。

sentences.english: Ruthless wild youth in the water, fixed Nanshan day free.
sentences.chinese: 无情野水青春在，不动南山白日闲。

sentences.english: And life's long night is ended, and he way Lies open onward to eternal day.
sentences.chinese: 生命的漫漫长夜已尽，大路开展，奔向永恒的白日。

sentences.english: Professor Chang is a Walter Mitty about becoming the president of China.
sentences.chinese: 张教授爱做中国总统的白日梦，但他没有领导的才能。

sentences.english: But forgive me for sharing my own private daydream.
sentences.chinese: 但原谅我要分享一下自己的白日梦。

sentences.english: If any man walk in the day, he stumbleth not, because he seeth the light of this world.
sentences.chinese: 人在白日走路，就不至跌倒，因为看见这世上的光。

sentences.english: Recent research shows / indicates that daydreaming is part of daily life .
sentences.chinese: 最近的研究成果表明，白日做梦是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: He doesn't work at all. Instead he sips coffee and day-dreams.
sentences.chinese: 他根本就不工作，而是一边喝咖啡一边做白日梦。
为我的歇息之处遮蔽黎明白日。

sentences.english: Can you program daydreaming and spacing out in your day planner?
sentences.chinese: 你会允许白日梦而阻断了你一天的计划吗？

sentences.english: The choice was clear -- abandon them, or his dreams.
sentences.chinese: 似乎是别无选择了，抛弃他们，或者继续做白日梦。

sentences.english: O shade, so sedate and decorous by day, with calm countenance and regulated pace;
sentences.chinese: 啊，白日里那么沉着和端庄，状貌安详，步履均匀。

definition: long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression
in broad daylight/in the middle of the day/KMT emblem, a white sun on a blue background
night scene/the dim light of night
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
